card.name: Abandoned Outpost
card.text: Abandoned Outpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Abandoned Outpost: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Aboshan, Cephalid Emperor
card.text: Tap an untapped Cephalid you control: Tap target permanent. {U}{U}{U}: Tap all creatures without flying.

card.name: Aboshan's Desire
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Threshold - Enchanted creature has shroud as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Acceptable Losses
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Acceptable Losses, discard a card at random. Acceptable Losses deals 5 damage to target creature.

card.name: Aegis of Honor
card.text: {1}: The next time an instant or sorcery spell would deal damage to you this turn, that spell deals that damage to its controller instead.

card.name: AEther Burst
card.text: Return up to X target creatures to their owners' hands, where X is one plus the number of cards named AEther Burst in all graveyards as you cast AEther Burst.

card.name: Afflict
card.text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Amugaba
card.text: Flying {2}{U}, Discard a card: Return Amugaba to its owner's hand.

card.name: Anarchist
card.text: When Anarchist enters the battlefield, you may return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ancestral Tribute
card.text: You gain 2 life for each card in your graveyard. Flashback {9}{W}{W}{W}

card.name: Animal Boneyard
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness."

card.name: Ashen Firebeast
card.text: {1}{R}: Ashen Firebeast deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Atogatog
card.text: Sacrifice an Atog creature: Atogatog gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

card.name: Aura Graft
card.text: Gain control of target Aura that's attached to a permanent. Attach it to another permanent it can enchant.

card.name: Auramancer
card.text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Aven Archer
card.text: Flying {2}{W}, {T}: Aven Archer deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Aven Cloudchaser
card.text: Flying When Aven Cloudchaser enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Aven Fisher
card.text: Flying When Aven Fisher dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Aven Flock
card.text: Flying {W}: Aven Flock gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Aven Shrine
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player gains X life, where X is the number of cards in all graveyards with the same name as that spell.

card.name: Aven Smokeweaver
card.text: Flying, protection from red

card.name: Aven Windreader
card.text: Flying {1}{U}: Target player reveals the top card of his or her library.

card.name: Balancing Act
card.text: Each player chooses a number of permanents he or she controls equal to the number of permanents controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Each player discards cards the same way.

card.name: Balshan Beguiler
card.text: Whenever Balshan Beguiler deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals the top two cards of his or her library. You choose one of those cards and put it into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Balshan Griffin
card.text: Flying {1}{U}, Discard a card: Return Balshan Griffin to its owner's hand.

card.name: Bamboozle
card.text: Target player reveals the top four cards of his or her library. You choose two of those cards and put them into his or her graveyard. Put the rest on top of his or her library in any order.

card.name: Barbarian Lunatic
card.text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Barbarian Lunatic: Barbarian Lunatic deals 2 damage to target creature.

card.name: Barbarian Ring
card.text: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Barbarian Ring deals 1 damage to you. Threshold - {R}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbarian Ring: Barbarian Ring deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Bash to Bits
card.text: Destroy target artifact. Flashback {4}{R}{R}

card.name: Battle of Wits
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 200 or more cards in your library, you win the game.

card.name: Battle Strain
card.text: Whenever a creature blocks, Battle Strain deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Bearscape
card.text: {1}{G}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Put a 2/2 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Beast Attack
card.text: Put a 4/4 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield. Flashback {2}{G}{G}{G}

card.name: Beloved Chaplain
card.text: Protection from creatures

card.name: Blazing Salvo
card.text: Blazing Salvo deals 3 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Blazing Salvo deal 5 damage to him or her.

card.name: Blessed Orator
card.text: Other creatures you control get +0/+1.

card.name: Bloodcurdler
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top card of your library into your graveyard. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Bloodcurdler gets +1/+1 and has "At the beginning of your end step, exile two cards from your graveyard."

card.name: Bog Wreckage
card.text: Bog Wreckage enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Bog Wreckage: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Bomb Squad
card.text: {T}: Put a fuse counter on target creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a fuse counter on each creature with a fuse counter on it. Whenever a creature has four or more fuse counters on it, remove all fuse counters from it and destroy it. That creature deals 4 damage to its controller.

card.name: Braids, Cabal Minion
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices an artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Buried Alive
card.text: Search your library for up to three creature cards and put them into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Burning Sands
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller sacrifices a land.

card.name: Cabal Inquisitor
card.text: Threshold - {1}{B}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery, and only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Cabal Patriarch
card.text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. {2}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Cabal Pit
card.text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Cabal Pit deals 1 damage to you. Threshold - {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Cabal Pit: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Catalyst Stone

card.text: Target player can't cast creature spells this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Cephalid Broker
card.text: {T}: Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards.

card.name: Cephalid Coliseum

card.text: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.

card.name: Chainflinger
card.text: {1}{R}, {T}: Chainflinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Threshold - {2}{R}, {T}: Chainflinger deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Chamber of Manipulation
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}, Discard a card: Gain control of target creature until end of turn."

card.name: Chance Encounter
card.text: Whenever you win a coin flip, put a luck counter on Chance Encounter. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Chance Encounter has ten or more luck counters on it, you win the game.

card.name: Charmed Pendant
card.text: {T}, Put the top card of your library into your graveyard: For each colored mana symbol in that card's mana cost, add one mana of that color to your mana pool. Activate this ability only any time you could cast an instant.

card.text: Put a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token onto the battlefield. Flashback {1}{G}

card.text: Flying Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Childhood Horror gets +2/+2 and can't block.

Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Decaying Soil has "Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, return that card to your hand."

card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library. Flashback {4}{G}

card.name: Delaying Shield
card.text: If damage would be dealt to you, put that many delay counters on Delaying Shield instead. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove all delay counters from Delaying Shield. For each delay counter removed this way, you lose 1 life unless you pay {1}{W}.

card.text: Tap all creatures without flying.

card.name: Dematerialize

card.name: Demolish

card.name: Demoralize

card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Untap target land.

card.name: Diabolic Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Diligent Farmhand

card.name: Dirty Wererat

card.text: Engulfing Flames deals 1 damage to target creature. It can't be regenerated this turn. Flashback {3}{R}

card.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

card.text: Target blocking creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Gorilla Titan

card.text: Plainswalk Whenever Graceful Antelope deals combat damage to a player, you may have target land become a Plains until Graceful Antelope leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Gravedigger
card.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Gravestorm
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent may exile a card from his or her graveyard. If that player doesn't, you may draw a card.

card.name: Ground Seal
card.text: When Ground Seal enters the battlefield, draw a card. Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.

card.text: First strike

card.name: Hallowed Healer

card.name: Haunting Echoes
card.text: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard other than basic land cards. For each card exiled this way, search that player's library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Hint of Insanity
card.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. That player discards all nonland cards with the same name as another card in his or her hand.

card.name: Impulsive Maneuvers
card.text: Whenever a creature attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, the next time that creature would deal combat damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead. If you lose the flip, the next time that creature would deal combat damage this turn, prevent that damage.

card.text: Vigilance Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Mystic Penitent gets +1/+1 and has flying.

card.text: Threshold - Mystic Visionary has flying as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Mystic Zealot
card.text: Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Mystic Zealot gets +1/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Nantuko Disciple
card.text: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Nantuko Elder
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Nantuko Mentor
card.text: {2}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that creature's power.

card.name: Nantuko Shrine
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player puts X 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is the number of cards in all graveyards with the same name as that spell.

card.name: Need for Speed
card.text: Sacrifice a land: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Nefarious Lich
card.text: If damage would be dealt to you, exile that many cards from your graveyard instead. If you can't, you lose the game. If you would gain life, draw that many cards instead. When Nefarious Lich leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

card.name: New Frontiers
card.text: Each player may search his or her library for up to X basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.

card.name: Nimble Mongoose
card.text: Shroud Threshold - Nimble Mongoose gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Nomad Decoy
card.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature. Threshold - {W}{W}, {T}: Tap two target creatures. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Nomad Stadium
card.text: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. Nomad Stadium deals 1 damage to you. Threshold - {W}, {T}, Sacrifice Nomad Stadium: You gain 4 life. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Nut Collector
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token onto the battlefield. Threshold - Squirrel creatures get +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Obstinate Familiar
card.text: If you would draw a card, you may skip that draw instead.

card.name: Otarian Juggernaut
card.text: Otarian Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Otarian Juggernaut gets +3/+0 and attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Overeager Apprentice
card.text: Discard a card, Sacrifice Overeager Apprentice: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Overrun
card.text: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Painbringer
card.text: {T}, Exile any number of cards from your graveyard: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards exiled this way.

card.name: Pardic Firecat
card.text: Haste If Pardic Firecat is in a graveyard, effects from spells named Flame Burst count it as a card named Flame Burst.

card.name: Pardic Miner
card.text: Sacrifice Pardic Miner: Target player can't play lands this turn.

card.name: Pardic Swordsmith
card.text: {R}, Discard a card at random: Pardic Swordsmith gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Patchwork Gnomes
card.text: Discard a card: Regenerate Patchwork Gnomes.

card.name: Patriarch's Desire
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/-2. Threshold - Enchanted creature gets an additional +2/-2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Patrol Hound
card.text: Discard a card: Patrol Hound gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Patron Wizard
card.text: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Pedantic Learning
card.text: Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from your library, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Peek
card.text: Look at target player's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Persuasion
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

card.name: Petrified Field
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Petrified Field: Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Phantatog
card.text: Sacrifice an enchantment: Phantatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Discard a card: Phantatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Phantom Whelp
card.text: When Phantom Whelp attacks or blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat.

card.name: Pianna, Nomad Captain
card.text: Whenever Pianna, Nomad Captain attacks, attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Pilgrim of Justice
card.text: Protection from red {W}, Sacrifice Pilgrim of Justice: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Pilgrim of Virtue
card.text: Protection from black {W}, Sacrifice Pilgrim of Virtue: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Piper's Melody
card.text: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Predict
card.text: Name a card, then target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If that card is the named card, you draw two cards. Otherwise, you draw a card.

card.name: Price of Glory
card.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, if it's not that player's turn, destroy that land.

card.name: Primal Frenzy
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has trample.

card.name: Psionic Gift
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

card.name: Psychatog
card.text: Discard a card: Psychatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Exile two cards from your graveyard: Psychatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Pulsating Illusion
card.text: Flying Discard a card: Pulsating Illusion gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Puppeteer
card.text: {U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.

card.name: Rabid Elephant
card.text: Whenever Rabid Elephant becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

card.name: Ravaged Highlands
card.text: Ravaged Highlands enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Ravaged Highlands: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Ray of Distortion
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Flashback {4}{W}{W}

card.name: Reckless Charge
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. Flashback {2}{R}

card.name: Recoup
card.text: Target sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. Flashback {3}{R}

card.name: Refresh
card.text: Regenerate target creature. Draw a card.

card.name: Repel
card.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Repentant Vampire
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Repentant Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Repentant Vampire. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Repentant Vampire is white and has "{T}: Destroy target black creature."

card.name: Resilient Wanderer
card.text: First strike Discard a card: Resilient Wanderer gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Rites of Initiation
card.text: Discard any number of cards at random. Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn for each card discarded this way.

card.name: Rites of Refusal
card.text: Discard any number of cards. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3} for each card discarded this way.

card.name: Rites of Spring
card.text: Discard any number of cards. Search your library for up to that many basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Roar of the Wurm
card.text: Put a 6/6 green Wurm creature token onto the battlefield. Flashback {3}{G}

card.name: Rotting Giant
card.text: Whenever Rotting Giant attacks or blocks, sacrifice it unless you exile a card from your graveyard.

card.name: Sacred Rites
card.text: Discard any number of cards. Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn for each card discarded this way.

card.name: Sadistic Hypnotist
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Target player discards two cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Sandstone Deadfall
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice two lands and Sandstone Deadfall: Destroy target attacking creature.

card.name: Sarcatog
card.text: Exile two cards from your graveyard: Sarcatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Sacrifice an artifact: Sarcatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Savage Firecat
card.text: Trample Savage Firecat enters the battlefield with seven +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever you tap a land for mana, remove a +1/+1 counter from Savage Firecat.

card.name: Scorching Missile
card.text: Scorching Missile deals 4 damage to target player. Flashback {9}{R}

card.name: Screams of the Damned
card.text: {1}{B}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Screams of the Damned deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Scrivener
card.text: When Scrivener enters the battlefield, you may return target instant card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Seafloor Debris
card.text: Seafloor Debris enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Seafloor Debris: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Second Thoughts
card.text: Exile target attacking creature. Draw a card.

card.name: Seize the Day
card.text: Untap target creature. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Flashback {2}{R}

card.name: Seton, Krosan Protector
card.text: Tap an untapped Druid you control: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Seton's Desire
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, all creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

card.name: Shadowblood Egg

card.name: Shadowblood Ridge
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Shadowmage Infiltrator
card.text: Fear Whenever Shadowmage Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Shelter
card.text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Shifty Doppelganger
card.text: {3}{U}, Exile Shifty Doppelganger: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, that creature gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice that creature. If you do, return Shifty Doppelganger to the battlefield.

card.name: Shower of Coals
card.text: Shower of Coals deals 2 damage to each of up to three target creatures and/or players. Threshold - Shower of Coals deals 4 damage to each of those creatures and/or players instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Simplify
card.text: Each player sacrifices an enchantment.

card.name: Skeletal Scrying
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Skeletal Scrying, exile X cards from your graveyard. You draw X cards and you lose X life.

card.name: Skull Fracture
card.text: Target player discards a card. Flashback {3}{B}

card.name: Skycloud Egg
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Skycloud Egg: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool. Draw a card.

card.name: Skycloud Expanse
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Skyshooter
card.text: Reach {T}, Sacrifice Skyshooter: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature with flying.

card.name: Soulcatcher
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature with flying dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Soulcatcher.

card.name: Spark Mage
card.text: Whenever Spark Mage deals combat damage to a player, you may have Spark Mage deal 1 damage to target creature that player controls.

card.name: Spellbane Centaur
card.text: Creatures you control can't be the targets of blue spells or abilities from blue sources.

card.name: Sphere of Duty
card.text: If a green source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

card.name: Sphere of Grace
card.text: If a black source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

card.name: Sphere of Law
card.text: If a red source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

card.name: Sphere of Reason
card.text: If a blue source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

card.name: Sphere of Truth
card.text: If a white source would deal damage to you, prevent 2 of that damage.

card.name: Spiritualize
card.text: Until end of turn, whenever target creature deals damage, you gain that much life. Draw a card.

card.name: Springing Tiger
card.text: Threshold - Springing Tiger gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Squirrel Mob
card.text: Squirrel Mob gets +1/+1 for each other Squirrel on the battlefield.

card.name: Squirrel Nest
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Put a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token onto the battlefield."

card.name: Stalking Bloodsucker
card.text: Flying {1}{B}, Discard a card: Stalking Bloodsucker gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Standstill
card.text: When a player casts a spell, sacrifice Standstill. If you do, each of that player's opponents draws three cards.

card.name: Steam Vines
card.text: Enchant land When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it and Steam Vines deals 1 damage to that land's controller. That player attaches Steam Vines to a land of his or her choice.

card.name: Steamclaw
card.text: {3}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. {1}, Sacrifice Steamclaw: Exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Still Life
card.text: {G}{G}: Still Life becomes a 4/3 Centaur creature until end of turn. It's still an enchantment.

card.name: Stone-Tongue Basilisk
card.text: Whenever Stone-Tongue Basilisk deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat. Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, all creatures able to block Stone-Tongue Basilisk do so.

card.name: Sungrass Egg
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Sungrass Egg: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool. Draw a card.

card.name: Sylvan Might
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Flashback {2}{G}{G}

card.name: Syncopate
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Tainted Pact
card.text: Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.

card.name: Tarnished Citadel
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Tarnished Citadel deals 3 damage to you.

card.name: Tattoo Ward
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from enchantments. This effect doesn't remove Tattoo Ward. Sacrifice Tattoo Ward: Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Terravore
card.text: Trample Terravore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of land cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Testament of Faith
card.text: {X}: Testament of Faith becomes an X/X Wall creature with defender until end of turn. It's still an enchantment.

card.name: Thaumatog
card.text: Sacrifice a land: Thaumatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Sacrifice an enchantment: Thaumatog gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Thermal Blast
card.text: Thermal Blast deals 3 damage to target creature. Threshold - Thermal Blast deals 5 damage to that creature instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Think Tank
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.

card.name: Thought Devourer
card.text: Flying Your maximum hand size is reduced by four.

card.name: Thought Eater
card.text: Flying Your maximum hand size is reduced by three.

card.name: Thought Nibbler
card.text: Flying Your maximum hand size is reduced by two.

card.name: Timberland Ruins
card.text: Timberland Ruins enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Timberland Ruins: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Time Stretch
card.text: Target player takes two extra turns after this one.

card.name: Tireless Tribe
card.text: Discard a card: Tireless Tribe gets +0/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Tombfire
card.text: Target player exiles all cards with flashback from his or her graveyard.

card.name: Touch of Invisibility
card.text: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Traumatize
card.text: Target player puts the top half of his or her library, rounded down, into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Traveling Plague
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of each upkeep, put a plague counter on Traveling Plague. Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each plague counter on Traveling Plague. When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller returns Traveling Plague from its owner's graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Treetop Sentinel
card.text: Flying, protection from green

card.name: Tremble
card.text: Each player sacrifices a land.

card.name: Twigwalker
card.text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Twigwalker: Two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Unifying Theory
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player may pay {2}. If the player does, he or she draws a card.

card.name: Upheaval
card.text: Return all permanents to their owners' hands.

card.name: Vampiric Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Vampiric Dragon this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampiric Dragon. {1}{R}: Vampiric Dragon deals 1 damage to target creature.

card.name: Verdant Succession
card.text: Whenever a green nontoken creature dies, that creature's controller may search his or her library for a card with the same name as that creature and put it onto the battlefield. If that player does, he or she shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Vivify
card.text: Target land becomes a 3/3 creature until end of turn. It's still a land. Draw a card.

card.name: Volcanic Spray
card.text: Volcanic Spray deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Flashback {1}{R}

card.name: Volley of Boulders
card.text: Volley of Boulders deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Flashback {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}

card.name: Wayward Angel
card.text: Flying, vigilance Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Wayward Angel gets +3/+3, is black, has trample, and has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature."

card.name: Werebear
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Threshold - Werebear gets +3/+3 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Whipkeeper
card.text: {T}: Whipkeeper deals damage to target creature equal to the damage already dealt to it this turn.

card.name: Whispering Shade
card.text: Swampwalk {B}: Whispering Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Wild Mongrel
card.text: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Words of Wisdom
card.text: You draw two cards, then each other player draws a card.

card.name: Zombie Assassin
card.text: {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard and Zombie Assassin: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Zombie Cannibal
card.text: Whenever Zombie Cannibal deals combat damage to a player, you may exile target card from that player's graveyard.

card.name: Zombie Infestation
card.text: Discard two cards: Put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Zombify
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Zoologist
card.text: {3}{G}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
